content.rendered:
Directed by Sai Ramani.

Written by Anil Ravipudi.

Cast Raghava Lawrence(ACP Shivakumar IPS / Shivaraj Pandi / Shiva). Nikki Galrani(Jaanu). Sathyaraj(Kirubakaran IPS). Ashutosh Rana(GK). Sukanya(Kiruba’s wife). Devadarshini Chetan(Banu). Kovai Sarala(Vaijayanthi). Vtv Ganesh(Shaktivel). Sathish(Sathish). Motta Rajendran(Tsunami Star Subash). Vamsi Krishna(Sanjay). Chaams(Chamu). Thambi Ramaiah(Home Minister (as Thambi Ramayya)). Pandu(Doctor). Sriman(Kasi). Madhan Bob(Jaanu’s brother-in-law). G.V. Kumar(GK’s right-hand). Manobala(GK’s sidekick). Raai Laxmi(Special appearance) . Joy Badlani(Ashok). Charandeep(GK’s henchman). Anupama Kumar(Minister Abhirami).Mayilsamy. Ashvin Raja(Jaanu’s colleague). Pavani Reddy(Abhirami’s daughter). M. Sandeep(Student).Mahanadhi Shankar

Language Tamil.

Producer R.B. Choudary.

Production Sivabalan Pictures. R.K. Duggal Studios. Vendhar Movies.
